auth.welcome_title: We provide services of automatic storage chambers, delivery of goods and much more.
auth.phone_help_text: We will send an SMS code to verify your phone number
auth.phone_not_sent: It looks like we couldn't send SMS to this number. Please check if you entered a valid phone number
auth.otp_enter_code: Enter the code that was sent to the number
auth.otp_invalid_code: You have entered an invalid code or the code has expired

home.logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to log out of this account?
home.unknown_error: An unknown error has occurred. Please try again later
home.no_locker: For new orders you need to find a Locker
home.not_implemented_text: This functionality will be implemented later
